3: Following the route Liv has mapped out, you run into a distorted Program Ghost.
How come... But the signal characteristics on it are definitely identical to 'Bianca'...
They're probably left behind by the springboard.
It is distorting because 'Bianca' couldn't clean up the messy departure of her invading data in time... Or maybe she never intended to clean it up for the host she hijacked.
This is probably going to affect the efficiency of our tactics, but I think we should fix it.
I would have done the same myself. If we extract the noises from the Program Ghost, we should theoretically be able to figure out the direction of the bridging route.
Information received... Verification completed. Program Code 90943 is now returning to work routine.
It's a Program Ghost after all. You can't expect it to behave in the same way as an AI.
We did help it, and that's enough.
